what: Fern tree of life in R
title: Fern tree of life in R
text: ftolr R package provides access Fern Tree Life (FTOL) related datasets. data originally compiled using methods described paper: Nitta JH, Schuettpelz E, Ramírez-Barahona S, Iwasaki W. 2022. open continuously updated fern tree life. Frontiers Plant Science 13, https://doi.org/10.3389/fpls.2022.909768

title: Fern tree of life in R
text: can install ftolr GitHub :

title: Fern tree of life in R
text: ft_tree() function loads FTOL current R session. several options available control branch lengths, presence absence outgroup, sampling scheme.
code: library(ftolr) # Default: consensus tree with branchlengths in units of time ft_tree() #>  #> Phylogenetic tree with 5600 tips and 5599 internal nodes. #>  #> Tip labels: #>   Acrostichum_danaeifolium, Acrostichum_speciosum, Acrostichum_aureum, Ceratopteris_richardii, Ceratopteris_cornuta, Ceratopteris_shingii, ... #> Node labels: #>   99/100, 100/100, 100, 100/100, 100/100, 100/100, ... #>  #> Rooted; includes branch lengths.  # Maximum-likelihood (ML) tree with raw branchlengths and outgroup pruned ft_tree(   branch_len = "raw",   consensus = FALSE,   drop_og = TRUE )  #>  #> Phylogenetic tree with 5582 tips and 5581 internal nodes. #>  #> Tip labels: #>   Acrostichum_danaeifolium, Acrostichum_speciosum, Acrostichum_aureum, Ceratopteris_richardii, Ceratopteris_cornuta, Ceratopteris_shingii, ... #> Node labels: #>   100/100, 100/100, 100, 100/100, 100, 100/100, ... #>  #> Rooted; includes branch lengths.

title: Fern tree of life in R
text: DNA sequences used build tree also available. can subset locus (gene) name can formatted matrix (DNA alignment) list.
code: # Default: aligned Sanger sequences ft_seqs() #> 5601 DNA sequences in binary format stored in a matrix. #>  #> All sequences of same length: 12716  #>  #> Labels: #> Acrostichum_danaeifolium #> Actiniopteris_dimorpha #> Actiniopteris_semiflabellata #> Adenophorus_sarmentosus #> Adenophorus_tenellus #> Adiantopsis_alata #> ... #>  #> More than 10 million bases: not printing base composition. #> (Total: 71.22 Mb)  # Unaligned rbcL ft_seqs(loci = "rbcL", aligned = FALSE) #> 4828 DNA sequences in binary format stored in a list. #>  #> Mean sequence length: 1251.168  #>    Shortest sequence: 210  #>     Longest sequence: 1428  #>  #> Labels: #> Acrostichum_danaeifolium #> Actiniopteris_dimorpha #> Actiniopteris_semiflabellata #> Adenophorus_sarmentosus #> Adenophorus_tenellus #> Adiantopsis_alata #> ... #>  #> Base composition: #>     a     c     g     t  #> 0.266 0.217 0.252 0.266  #> (Total: 6.04 Mb)

title: Fern tree of life in R
text: can check current version FTOL data included ftolr ft_data_ver():

title: Fern tree of life in R
text: use package, please cite ! example: FTOL working group. 2022. ftolr: Data Fern Tree Life (FTOL) https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.6401660 example DOI overall package. latest DOI, cite using latest version package:  Please also cite paper describing data generated: Nitta JH, Schuettpelz E, Ramírez-Barahona S, Iwasaki W. 2022. open continuously updated fern tree life. Frontiers Plant Science 13, https://doi.org/10.3389/fpls.2022.909768

title: GenBank accessions used in the Fern Tree of Life (FTOL), wide format — accessions_wide
text: join_by provided Sanger (non-plastome) sequences. specimen_voucher publication provided Sanger (non-plastome) sequences, across loci. specimen_voucher converted lower case, alpha-numeric characters account orthographic variation GenBank data. details methods used infer tree, see Nitta et al. 2022.

what: Fossil calibration points used for dating Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — con_fossils
title: Fossil calibration points used for dating Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — con_fossils
text: con_fossils used consensus tree; ml_fossils used ML tree.

title: Fossil calibration points used for dating Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — con_fossils
Fossil calibration points used for dating Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — con_fossils
text: tibble (data frame) 52 rows 12 columns. n_fos Unique ID number fossil minimum_age Minimum age apply fossil constraint node_calibrated Node calibrated fossil constraint. Combination 'affinities' 'affinities_group' fossil_taxon Taxonomic name fossil (without author) affinities_group Type group fossil belongs (crown stem) affinities Narrowest clade fossil belongs ; clade whose date constrained fossil monophyly affinities monophyletic? 'Yes', '', 'Monotypic' number_tips Number tips clade constrained fossil mrca Node number MRCA clade constrained fossil stem_mrca Node number parent node MRCA clade constrained fossil tip_1 Name one taxon defines clade constrained fossil tip_2 Name another taxon defines clade constrained fossil object class spec_tbl_df (inherits tbl_df, tbl, data.frame) 52 rows 12 columns.

title: Fossil calibration points used for dating Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — con_fossils
text: fossils con_fossils ml_fossils generally , node calibrates may differ trees differences topology. Also, cases, given fossil may applied ML consensus tree () topology tree makes fossil redundant another fossil. node corresponding fossil constraint defined recent common ancestor (MRCA, column 'mrca') two tips columns ('tip_1' 'tip_2') crown affinities, parent node (column 'stem_mrca') stem affinities. two tips identified automatically monophyletic clades, hand non-monophyletic clades. 'mrca' defined monotypic groups ('stem_mrca'). include constraint root tree. details methods used molecular dating, see Nitta et al. 2022.

title: Fossil calibration points used for dating Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — con_fossils

what: Load the DNA sequences used to build the Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — ft_seqs
title: Load the DNA sequences used to build the Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — ft_seqs
text: details data, see plastome_alignment plastome sequences sanger_alignment Sanger sequences.

title: Load the DNA sequences used to build the Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — ft_seqs
code: ft_seqs(   loci = NULL,   plastome = FALSE,   aligned = TRUE,   del_gaps = ifelse(is.null(loci), FALSE, TRUE),   drop_og = FALSE )

title: Load the DNA sequences used to build the Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — ft_seqs
text: loci Character vector (optional); names loci include output. NULL (default), loci included. list valid locus names, see plastome_parts plastome loci sanger_parts Sanger loci. plastome Logical vector length 1; TRUE, alignment include loci species complete plastomes available; otherwise include Sanger loci species. Default FALSE. aligned Logical vector length 1; TRUE, output aligned sequences (matrix); otherwise unaligned (list). Default TRUE. del_gaps Logical vector length 1; TRUE, gaps deleted alignment. Default TRUE loci NULL, FALSE otherwise. drop_og Logical vector length 1; TRUE, outgroup (non-ferns) excluded; otherwise outgroup included. Default FALSE.

title: Load the DNA sequences used to build the Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — ft_seqs
text: List matrix class "DNAbin"; DNA sequences.

title: Load the DNA sequences used to build the Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — ft_seqs
text: subsetting loci, columns / rows consisting gaps deleted regardless del_gaps argument (del_gaps deletes gaps, typically resulting unaligned sequences). details methods used assemble alignments, see Nitta et al. 2022.

title: Load the DNA sequences used to build the Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — ft_seqs
text: Nitta JH, Schuettpelz E, Ramírez-Barahona S, Iwasaki W. (2022) open continuously updated fern tree life. https://doi.org/10.3389/fpls.2022.909768

title: Load the DNA sequences used to build the Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — ft_seqs
code: # Default is aligned Sanger sequences ft_seqs() #> 5601 DNA sequences in binary format stored in a matrix. #>  #> All sequences of same length: 12716  #>  #> Labels: #> Acrostichum_danaeifolium #> Actiniopteris_dimorpha #> Actiniopteris_semiflabellata #> Adenophorus_sarmentosus #> Adenophorus_tenellus #> Adiantopsis_alata #> ... #>  #> More than 10 million bases: not printing base composition. #> (Total: 71.22 Mb)

what: Load the Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — ft_tree
title: Load the Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — ft_tree
text: details methods used infer tree, see Nitta et al. 2022.

title: Load the Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — ft_tree
code: ft_tree(   branch_len = "ultra",   consensus = TRUE,   rooted = TRUE,   backbone = FALSE,   drop_og = FALSE,   label_ages = FALSE,   decimals = NULL )

title: Load the Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — ft_tree
text: branch_len Character vector length 1; treat branch lengths. Must choose "ultra" (ultrametric tree, branchlengths units time), "raw" (raw branchlengths units genetic change), "clado" (cladogram, branchlengths).  Default "ultra". consensus Logical vector length 1; TRUE, majority-rule extended consensus phylogeny returned; otherwise returns maximum-likelihood tree. Default TRUE. rooted Logical vector length 1; TRUE, phylogeny rooted bryophytes; otherwise phylogeny unrooted. Default TRUE. backbone Logical vector length 1; TRUE, backbone phylogeny (species complete plastomes available) returned; otherwise phylogeny include species. Default FALSE. drop_og Logical vector length 1; TRUE, outgroup (non-ferns) excluded; otherwise outgroup included. Default FALSE. label_ages Logical vector length 1; TRUE, internal nodes labeled ages. works branch_len "ultra". Default FALSE. decimals Numeric vector length 1; number decimals rounding node labels label_ages TRUE; null (default) rounding.

title: Load the Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — ft_tree
text: List class "phylo"; phylogenetic tree.

title: Load the Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — ft_tree
text: combinations possible. example, branch_len = "ultra" available backbone = FALSE.

text: Nitta JH, Schuettpelz E, Ramírez-Barahona S, Iwasaki W. (2022) open continuously updated fern tree life. https://doi.org/10.3389/fpls.2022.909768

title: Load the Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) — ft_tree
code: # Default is the consensus tree with branchlengths in units of time ft_tree() #>  #> Phylogenetic tree with 5600 tips and 5599 internal nodes. #>  #> Tip labels: #>   Acrostichum_danaeifolium, Acrostichum_speciosum, Acrostichum_aureum, Ceratopteris_richardii, Ceratopteris_cornuta, Ceratopteris_shingii, ... #> Node labels: #>   99/100, 100/100, 100, 100/100, 100/100, 100/100, ... #>  #> Rooted; includes branch lengths.

what: Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) dated consensus phylogeny — ftol_con_dated_tree
title: Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) dated consensus phylogeny — ftol_con_dated_tree
text: Majority-rule extended consensus phylogenetic tree ferns inferred seven loci maximum-likelihood dated using 60 fossil ferns constraints, including maximal sampling available species GenBank.

title: Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) dated consensus phylogeny — ftol_con_dated_tree
Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) dated consensus phylogeny — ftol_con_dated_tree
text: List class "phylo"

title: Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) dated consensus phylogeny — ftol_con_dated_tree
text: backbone phylogeny based full plastome sequences including 441 tips first inferred used constraint tree consensus tree. Includes 5,600 tips 5,599 internal nodes. Branch lengths units time (Ma). Node labels bootstrap support (BS) values (%). details methods used infer tree, see Nitta et al. 2022.

title: Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) dated consensus phylogeny — ftol_con_dated_tree
text: Nitta JH, Schuettpelz E, Ramírez-Barahona S, Iwasaki W. (2022) open continuously updated fern tree life. https://doi.org/10.3389/fpls.2022.909768

title: Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) dated maximum-likelihood phylogeny — ftol_ml_dated_tree
Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) dated maximum-likelihood phylogeny — ftol_ml_dated_tree
text: List class "phylo"

title: Fern Tree of Life (FTOL) dated maximum-likelihood phylogeny — ftol_ml_dated_tree
text: backbone phylogeny based full plastome sequences including 441 tips first inferred used constraint tree ML tree. Includes 5,600 tips 5,599 internal nodes. Branch lengths units time (Ma). Node labels bootstrap support (BS) values (%) separated forward slash. BS value slash BS calculated full (Sanger) sampling; BS value slash BS calculated backbone (plastome) sampling. details methods used infer tree, see Nitta et al. 2022.
